title: 3 reasons why we can win the fight against poverty
description: Half of the world's poorest people have something in common: they're small farmers. In this eye-opening talk, social entrepreneur Andrew Youn shows how his group, One Acre Fund, is helping these farmers lift themselves out of poverty by delivering to them life-sustaining farm services that are already in use all over the world. Enter this talk believing we'll never be able to solve hunger and extreme poverty, and leave it with a new understanding of the scale of the world's biggest problems.
author: Andrew Youn
keywords: TED, talks, activism, Africa, agriculture, community, food, future, global issues, poverty, society, farming, global development, innovation, Audacious Project
